text: Revolución is the second studio album by Australian-American hard rock band The Dead Daisies. It was released on August 31, 2015, by Spitfire Music, which peaked at No. 52 on the ARIA Albums Chart. ==Track listing== Songwriting credits via disc booklet. ==Personnel== Credits are adapted from disc booklet. *Marco Mendoza \- bass, backing vocals *David Lowy – guitar *John Corabi – vocals, acoustic guitar *Dizzy Reed – keyboards, backing vocals *Richard Fortus – guitar *Jackie Barnes – drums, percussion, backing vocals Additional personnel *Brian Tichy – drums on Evil and Midnight Moses *Jimmy Barnes - vocals on Empty Heart *Yaimi Karell Lay - percussion on Evil and Midnight Moses == References == Category:2015 albums Category:The Dead Daisies albums
title: Revolución (The Dead Daisies album)
